text: 'Nice spot!'

text: '(Translated by Google) It has a space to play billiards

author: Veronica Glennon
text: "Good spot for beer & basic mixed drinks - they don't serve food so you can get food delivered or bring takeout with you. Definitely a spot that locals hang out and an older crowd compared to the bars on Washington St / close to the PATH. The regulars can be a little territorial especially at the pool table. Trivia on Wednesdays is always fun."

author: Gerry Louis
text: 'Great place hang out.'

author: Brian Fang
text: 'Saturday go to!'

author: Hannah
text: 'Love this place! My dog Nala loves this place so much that she runs to the door when I say “Dog bar?!” Very friendly servers and well-priced drinks!'

author: vanessa hoffman
text: "Cool place out of the throws of the part of Hoboken with bars that feel a bit too crowded. This bar had a nice chill vibe. Music was good
column6: with a few games in the back. I'd definitely go back"

author: Rudy Scott
text: "Cool place out of the throws of the part of Hoboken with bars that feel a bit too crowded. This bar had a nice chill vibe. Music was good
column6: with a few games in the back. I'd definitely go back"

author: Ryan McEnerney
text: 'DOGS ARE WELCOME!'

author: Michael Roithmayr
text: 'It was fabulous
column6: great place to hang and play with friends'

author: Chris Frie
text: 'The Staff are rude.  Also the Ale House if very dirty and unsanitary.'

author: Oscar
text: "One of my favorite places in Hoboken. Very laid back vibe. Free darts
column6:
and shuffle board.

No food is served but you can bring your own .

Best part... it's puppy friendly!"

author: T. S.
text: 'Dog friendly !!'

author: Family Fan
text: 'Decent spot for a drink while watching the game. Wish they had better specials though.'

author: Ankit Baxi
text: "The place was kinda small. Made it hard to get around. I only had drinks for Sunday Funday so I can't speak to the food."

author: Priya Gautam
text: 'It’s a cozy pet friendly place with good beer. There is no food served here apart from some complimentary pop corns.'

author: Brett Potenta
text: 'Pool
column7: and a jukebox.  What more would you want in a bar?'

author: Harrison Kanarick
text: 'A nice fun bar on the outskirts of Hoboken.  Not terribly crowded on a Saturday night
column6: and has a pool and shuffleboard table.'

author: Mel Jiang
text: 'typical american bar'

author: Jacob M
text: 'nice dog friendly bar with pool and shuffleboard'

author: Mark Lavery
text: 'Excellent.  Nary a Daly. Vin was on point.'

author: Kelvin Gomez
text: "Great bar with amazing specials
column6: and darts. To top it off
column7: dog-friendly! You'll always run into a poouch while here!"

author: S Campaign
text: 'The hours are incorrect.  During the week they are not open until 2am.  Nice try Ale House!  #frauds'

author: Valerie Acosta
text: 'Learn how to answer a phone'

author: Will Siegfried
text:
'Ale House has the essentials:
-Cold Beer
-Friendly Bartenders
-Dart Boards
-Pool Table

Oh yea and its dog friendly ! Awesome'

author: Evelyn Page
text: 'Amazing beer selection and service'

author: Ari Freuman
text: "It's good"

author: Kevin McDonald
text: "Went here with my girlfriend. The bartender was extremely rude and accused my girlfriend of having a fake ID because her birthday didn't match the date of expiration on her license. Would never come back to this place."

author: Ryan Batiuk
text: 'Good selection of ales!'

author: Amn Singh
text: 'Nice little place to hang out and get surprise visits by dogo friends because the place is pet friendly. It has a pool table
column5: darts and suffle board which are kinda hard to get your hands on. We got a round of free beer so yay for the place. 5 stars just for it being pets friendly :)'

author: Ed Rosado
text: 'Love this place have been going since they opened. Can not go wrong with free pool
column7: and the occasional popcorn. Reasonable drink prices.'

author: John P
text: 'Shuffleboard is rigged
column5: if a hairy Armenian man offers to play you for money walk away.'

author: Braham R.
text: 'Nice bartender'

author: Jon LoCascio
text: 'Amazing local watering hole with great tap selections. The bartender was awesome and the free pool table and jukebox was terrific. This area of Hoboken is my fav.'

author: Maria Lopez Cavestany
text: 'Was here for the yappy hour
column5: it was awesome!! There were dogs everywhere and half priced beers! What more could you want??'

author: J A
text: 'Quick drink. Pool
column5: darts and a nice shuffleboard. Dog friendly.'

author: Carmine Sodora
text: 'Great beer
column6: phenomenal atmosphere and games to boot!  Great value as well!'

author: Greg Whipple
text: 'Free popcorn. Good service and beer selection. Darts and a pool table.'

author: Steven Hantman
text: 'Awesome place to hang out'

author: Delmys Romero
text: 'I am going today 10/ 7/ 2017'

author: Craig O'Sullivan
text: "Sports bar with frat house vibe.  They don't serve food so they're dog friendly."

author: Jonathan Grubert
text: 'Great Selection of beer and Dogs are allowed!'

author: Brian
text: 'This place is great and I love their trivia'

text: "My friend hosted her birthday here. It's dog friendly which is nice but as such

text: 'Dog friendly beer bar with free games.'
